packages.name: 3d Effect 3d Object Prop
packages.description: Component extracted from Framer export using browser automation. Code extracted from Framer scripts.

safety.notes: Code extracted via browser automation. Review for dependencies.

packages.name: 3in1 Mix It Up Module
packages.description: Three-in-one interactive module featuring Ripple (height-field water simulation), Kaleido (kaleidoscope pattern generator), and Moiré (rotating pattern effect). Switch between modes with buttons or keyboard shortcuts (1/2/3). Press G for glow effect, R to reset.

safety.notes: Pure canvas and SVG animations. No media playback. Safe for all contexts. Ripple effect responds to pointer interaction.

controls.label: Ripple Mode
controls.description: Switch to ripple water simulation mode

packages.name: Afterimage Pulse Prop
packages.description: Pulsing afterimage effect using color inversion. Image alternates between normal and inverted colors with opacity pulsing, creating a visual afterimage effect.

safety.notes: Pure CSS animation with image filter effects. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Anisotropic Velvet Background
packages.description: Interactive velvet texture background with anisotropic lighting. Drag pointer to comb the velvet and change the lighting direction. Uses oriented noise sampling to create a realistic velvet texture effect.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with procedural texture generation. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Ascii Drawing Tablet Module
packages.description: Component extracted from Framer export using browser automation. Code extracted from Framer scripts.

safety.notes: Code extracted via browser automation. Review for dependencies.

packages.name: Basic Shadow Bubbles Background
packages.description: Caustic sparkles dance under frosted glass. Interactive bubble particles that respond to pointer movement, creating a swirling effect. Drag pointer to influence particle movement.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with particle physics. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Bubble Buster Background
packages.description: Animated bubble background with floating rainbow bubbles. Bubbles rise from bottom to top with gentle horizontal drift and color cycling.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Bubble Mouse Trail
packages.description: Lightweight DOM bubbles spawn along the cursor path and fade out with keyframe animation. Adjustable bubble count, throttle rate, and size range. Respects prefers-reduced-motion.

safety.notes: Pure DOM animation with CSS keyframes. No media playback or external dependencies. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Bubbling Rainbow Rings
packages.description: Pointer trail effect that spawns expanding rainbow rings with adjustable density and fade.

safety.notes: Pointer/touch only. Particle counts configurable to mitigate performance.

packages.name: Chrono-Quilt
packages.description: Temporal quilt effect showing different moments of the same animated scene. The canvas is divided into a grid where each tile displays a different frame from a time buffer, creating a mesmerizing quilt pattern of rainbow circles.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with temporal buffer effects. Respects prefers-reduced-motion.

packages.name: Errl Tunnel
packages.description: Tunnel effect overlay with multiple concentric rings that zoom inward, creating a depth illusion. Useful for hero transitions and portal effects.

safety.notes: Pure CSS animation with SVG rings. Respects prefers-reduced-motion.

packages.name: Errl's Dream Compiler
packages.description: Interactive particle network that responds to keyboard input. Each keypress rewrites the geometry rules using a seeded random number generator, creating dynamic rainbow particle layers with connective filaments.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with keyboard interaction. Respects prefers-reduced-motion.

packages.name: Errl's Event Horizon
packages.description: Interactive black hole effect with time dilation. Drag to move the black hole around the screen. The gravitational lensing effect distorts the rainbow background, creating a realistic black hole visualization with accretion glow.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with gravitational lensing effects. No media playback. Respects prefers-reduced-motion.

packages.name: Fast Rainbow Rings Cursor
packages.description: Temporal echo pool cursor trail with expanding rainbow rings. Tracks pointer movement and creates expanding circular waves. Space key or button toggles forward/reverse time direction.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Fluffy Pixel Trail Cursor
packages.description: Pixelated cursor trail effect with fluffy particle bursts. Particles spawn at cursor position with random velocities and fade out over time. Features adjustable spawn rate, decay speed, and pixel size.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with particle physics. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Gradient Box Button
packages.description: Animated rainbow gradient button with customizable text, angle, and border radius. Includes hover lift effect and gradient shift animation.

safety.notes: Pure CSS button with no media dependencies.

packages.name: Gradient Waves Text
packages.description: Gradient-masked headline with CSS wave distortion and adjustable speed/amplitude.

safety.notes: Pure CSS + JS text animation.

packages.name: Holographic Cube Cursor
packages.description: 3D holographic cube cursor trail with rotating cubes following pointer movement. Features rainbow gradient faces, adjustable size, rotation speed, and trail length. Rebuilt from Framer export as standalone canvas implementation.

safety.notes: Pure canvas 3D animation. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Holographic Cursor Trail
packages.description: Gradient dots follow the cursor and fade out using opacity transitions. Adjustable dot count, throttle rate, fade delay, and lifetime. Respects prefers-reduced-motion.

safety.notes: Pure DOM animation with CSS transitions. No media playback or external dependencies. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Interactive Wire Grid Background
packages.description: Interactive wire grid that warps around pointer movement. Grid lines bend and distort based on proximity to cursor, creating a dynamic 3D-like effect. Adjustable columns, rows, and warp intensity.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with interactive grid warping. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: IsoBubble Voronoi Background
packages.description: Interactive Voronoi diagram with pulsing bubble cells. Cells are colored based on proximity to animated points. Press P to add new points. Cells pulse and animate creating a dynamic cellular pattern.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with Voronoi diagram generation. Keyboard interaction (P key) to add points. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Liquid Text
packages.description: Liquid headline animation with adjustable amplitude, velocity, drift, and color for hero typography experiments.

safety.notes: CSS + JS animation only. Respects prefers-reduced-motion (animation pauses when enabled).

packages.name: Live Gradient Mixer
packages.description: Interactive gradient breeding lab—mix two swatches to spawn a new linear gradient with configurable mutation and transparency.

safety.notes: DOM-only; no audio/video. Clipboard access is optional and falls back gracefully.

packages.name: Moire Melt Prop
packages.description: Moire pattern effect using two overlapping images with difference blend mode. Adjustable offset, rotation, and pulse intensity create dynamic moire interference patterns.

safety.notes: Pure CSS animation with blend modes and transforms. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Orbital Moiré Loom
packages.description: Animated moiré pattern created by weaving orbital lines. Press A to slow down rotation, D to speed up. Creates mesmerizing moiré interference patterns as the lines orbit and overlap.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with keyboard controls. Respects prefers-reduced-motion.

packages.name: Parallax Shooting Stars Background
packages.description: Parallax starfield with depth-based warping. Stars move in circular patterns and respond to pointer movement with parallax effect based on depth. Features chroma trails and rainbow color cycling.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with particle physics and parallax effects. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Particle Face Parallax Push Module
packages.description: Component extracted from Framer export using browser automation. Code extracted from Framer scripts.

safety.notes: Code extracted via browser automation. Review for dependencies.

packages.name: Particle Shapes Module
packages.description: Component extracted from Framer export using browser automation. Code extracted from Framer scripts.

safety.notes: Code extracted via browser automation. Review for dependencies.

packages.name: Particle Shapes Module Extracted
packages.description: Component extracted from Framer export using browser automation. Code extracted from Framer scripts.

safety.notes: Code extracted via browser automation. Review for dependencies.

packages.name: Pixel Square Rainbow Cursor
packages.description: Pixelated square cursor trail with rainbow color cycling. Squares spawn at cursor position and fade out while cycling through rainbow hues. Features adjustable count, size, and decay rate.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with pixelated squares. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Polar Kaleido Drip Module
packages.description: Interactive kaleidoscope drawing tool with radial symmetry. Draw with pointer to create symmetric patterns. Press Q/W to adjust symmetry count (2-24). Features ambient auto-drip animation.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with interactive drawing. Keyboard interaction (Q/W keys) to adjust symmetry. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Prism Refraction Map Module
packages.description: Interactive prism lens effect with rainbow background. Drag to move the prism lens, scroll to adjust refraction strength. Creates realistic lens distortion effect on animated rainbow circles.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with lens refraction effects. Scroll wheel interaction to adjust strength. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Purple Smile Hover Confetti Button
packages.description: Purple smile button that emits rainbow confetti particles on hover. Confetti particles spawn from button center with physics-based movement. Continuous confetti stream while hovering.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with confetti particles. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Rainbow Dot Suttle Gradient Background
packages.description: Animated background with hexagonal dot pattern overlay and subtle rainbow gradient layers. Multiple radial gradients create depth with gentle movement.

safety.notes: Pure CSS background animation. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Rainbow Drawing Tablet Module
packages.description: Component extracted from Framer export using browser automation. Code extracted from Framer scripts.

safety.notes: Code extracted via browser automation. Review for dependencies.

packages.name: Rainbow Fluid Smoke
packages.description: Pointer-driven rainbow smoke trail with adjustable length, drag, glow, and color cycling.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation. Respects prefers-reduced-motion (animation pauses when enabled).

packages.name: Rainbow Neural Pathways
packages.description: Interactive particle network with rainbow gradients, pointer attraction, gravity drift, and controllable edge density.

safety.notes: Canvas animation only. Pointer/touch interactions gated by standard pointer events.

packages.name: Rainbow Projector Fluid Module
packages.description: Interactive paint splat effect with rainbow colors. Click and drag to create paint splats that blend and fade over time. Features adjustable glow intensity and auto-dye rate for automatic splat generation.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with paint splat effects. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Rainbow Spinning Background
packages.description: MIDI-reactive chromafog background with spinning conic gradient. Features adjustable hue rotation and bloom opacity. Optional MIDI support for real-time control via CC messages. Keyboard shortcuts: H for hue, B for bloom.

safety.notes: MIDI access only requested after explicit button press. Pure CSS animation with conic gradient. Respects prefers-reduced-motion. Can be used without MIDI via sliders or keyboard.

packages.name: Rainbow Spinning Button
packages.description: Circular button with spinning conic gradient background and goo-filtered SVG mask. Includes parallax pointer tracking and adjustable spin speed.

safety.notes: Pure CSS/SVG animation with pointer tracking. Respects prefers-reduced-motion.

packages.name: Rainbow Square Grid Background
packages.description: Animated rainbow-colored square grid pattern. Colors cycle through the spectrum based on position and time, creating a vibrant grid effect.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Rainbow String Particles
packages.description: Canvas-based particle system with rainbow-colored particles connected by strings when within proximity. Adjustable particle count, connection distance, and speed. Could replace hero orbit background.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Rainbow Trailing Orbs Cursor
packages.description: Cursor trail with rainbow-colored beads that follow each other using spring physics. Each bead follows the previous one creating a smooth trailing effect with adjustable count, drag, and size.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with spring physics. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Rainbow Tunnel
packages.description: Two-layer conic gradient that rotates through Errl's silhouette with adjustable speeds, direction, and mask shape.

safety.notes: Canvas-free CSS animation. Respects prefers-reduced-motion (animations pause when requested).

packages.name: Ribbon Topology
packages.description: Bezier ribbon renderer with faux depth sorting and adjustable density, fade, and color drift.

safety.notes: Canvas animation only. Honors prefers-reduced-motion and pauses drawing when enabled.

packages.name: Side Scrolling BW Square Wall Background
packages.description: Black and white checkerboard pattern that scrolls horizontally. Creates an infinite scrolling wall effect with alternating square pattern.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Silhouette Inversion
packages.description: Visual illusion effect that inverts image colors and hue. Stare at the inverted image for ~10 seconds, then toggle to see the afterimage effect. Toggle via Space key or button click.

safety.notes: Pure CSS filter effect. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Simple Blue Bubble Trail Cursor
packages.description: Simple blue-to-cyan bubble trail cursor effect with spring physics. Beads follow pointer movement with adjustable count, drag, and size. Rebuilt from Framer export as standalone canvas implementation.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with spring physics. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Spectral Harp Membrane
packages.description: Interactive membrane visualization that responds to pointer movement and optional microphone input. Spring-based physics creates ripple effects across a grid. Useful as an intro vignette or ambient background.

safety.notes: Microphone access only requested after explicit button press. Audio analysis drives membrane displacement. Can be used without microphone via pointer interaction.

packages.name: Subliminal Script Veins Background
packages.description: Glowing script-veins that rewrite themselves. Animated lines move in organic patterns creating a hypnotic effect. Lines continuously regenerate creating an ever-changing pattern.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with line drawing. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: Taffy Typing
packages.description: SVG text path with draggable control handles for taffy-stretching effects. Includes goo filter and gradient fill.

safety.notes: Pure SVG manipulation. No media or external dependencies.

packages.name: Terrapin Whirl
packages.description: Layered vector-field swirl rendered on canvas with pointer-influenced velocity and adjustable trail.

safety.notes: Canvas animation only. Controls adjust speed and trail persistence.

packages.name: Terrapin Whirl Module
packages.description: Module variant of Terrapin Whirl: layered vector-field swirl rendered on canvas with pointer-influenced velocity and adjustable trail. Compact container suitable for embedding.

safety.notes: Canvas animation only. Controls adjust speed and trail persistence. Pointer interaction modulates swirl velocity.

packages.name: Time-Crystal Trails Background
packages.description: Time-crystal particle trails with difference blending mode. Particles move in circular patterns creating glowing trails that fade over time. Adjustable decay and speed controls.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with particle physics and blend modes. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.

packages.name: WebCam Effects
packages.description: Permission-gated webcam playground with RGB split, glitch trails, and monochrome bloom effects. Includes capture gallery.

safety.notes: Camera access only requested after explicit button press. Video remains muted.

packages.name: Weird Motion Trace Cursor
packages.description: Distorted motion trace cursor with weird sine/cosine distortion effects. Trail follows cursor path with time-based distortion creating wavy, organic motion. Features adjustable trail length, distortion intensity, and speed.

safety.notes: Pure canvas animation with distorted trail effects. No media playback. Safe for all contexts.
